[00:00.00]Head & Heart (feat. MNEK) - Joel Corry/MNEK
[00:00.19]Composed by：Dan Dare/Joel Corry/John Courtidis/Leo Kalyan/Lewis Thompson/Neave Applebaum/Robert Michael Nelson Harvey/Uzo Eminike
[00:00.38]Ba-ba-ba-dum ba-ba-dum ba-ba-dum
[00:04.08]Ba-ba-ba-dum ba-ba-dum ba-ba-da-dum
[00:08.03]Oh my God oh my God
[00:09.70]This feeling's just began
[00:11.87]I'm saying things I've never said
[00:13.54]Doing things I've never done
[00:15.73]Oh my God oh my God
[00:17.45]When I see you I shoot away
[00:19.43]But I'm frozen in motion
[00:21.31]And my head tells me to stop
[00:22.75]Tells me to stop
[00:23.74]Few things feelings I feel about us
[00:27.69]Try to fight it but it's never enough
[00:31.62]My heart is certain
[00:33.05]It's more than a crush
[00:34.76]'Cause I'm frozen in motion
[00:36.76]And my head tells me to stop
[00:38.25]But my heart goes
